word_mean: 绦虫：扁带形肠道寄生虫，寄生于人类肠道的主要是绦虫、裂头绦虫、膜壳绦虫、棘球绦虫和复孔绦虫等属。绦虫的卵为中间宿主食入，即在其组织中形成幼虫，如裂头蚴或全尾蚴(plerocercoid)、囊尾蚴(cysticercus)和棘球囊(hydatid cyst)，见cyst项下。中间宿主的肉被终末宿主吃进，即在其消化管内发育为成虫，具有连接器即头节，未分化颈和由数目不同节片构成的链体等结构，各节片皆雌雄同体，故能产卵

sentence.Network_en: The tapeworm is an inhabitant of the intestine.
sentence.Network_cn: 绦虫是栖居肠内的寄生虫.

sentence.Network_en: You'll even find a 28-foot-long tapeworm on display.
sentence.Network_cn: 你甚至可以看到一条28英尺长的绦虫在这里展出。

sentence.Network_en: Undercooked pork may contain living " bladder worms " of the pig tapeworm.
sentence.Network_cn: 未煮熟的猪肉也许含有猪绦虫活的 “ 囊尾幼虫 ”.

entry.def: A tapeworm is a long, flat parasite which lives in the stomach and intestines of animals or people.

means.word_mean: 1. ribbon-like flatworms that are parasitic in the intestines of humans and other vertebrates
